content: knitted hat/hipster hat for men in drops air the piece is worked bottom up with rib sizes s - l pattern no ai-338 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 **materials** drops air from garnstudio 100-100-100 g colour 05 brown **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm
